item.description:
Spotted Cow is a locally brewed WI ale, and has a beautiful smooth taste. When I was in Milwaukee, I was introduced to this by the locals and somehow I was hooked to it so much. From my last trip to Milwaukee I have some 20bottles of this beer with me and who else to share this with, other than beer lovers from this group!! This is a special beer and not available in New England area for sure.

There is an Brazilian restaurant downstairs, which can supply food for the night. Mostly sandwiches, pizza etc.

I'll also throw in a Bollywood movie/songs to lighten up the evening, if some people prefer to watch a new genre of movie. I have a bunch of them, so may be we can decide on this one that night, what the group will be interested to do.

NOTE: Drinks and Movie is no cost to you, of course. No obligation to drink beer, I can get wine, other beers on request, there is a liquor store downstairs ;). Also some non-alcoholic beverages will also be there to choose from. Only food cost is shared!

VENUE
Address:
379 Broadway Apt 10
Somerville MA 02145

How to reach there: Either take orange line to Sullivan or Red Line to Davis Sq. Take bus 89, this bus runs from Sullivan to Davis Sq stn. Get down at the 'Main St' bus stop and the apartment is right on the Broadway and Main St.
item.name: Spotted Cow Night- (Special Wisconsin Beer)
